content:
代挽王潜齋 其一/宋 王柏

自立西山雪，聲名四十年。
清思奎畫重，忠簡物情憐。
廊廟風雲斷，園林歲月遷。
潜齋元不死，有子續遺編。

account.note:
每天四首唐、宋诗，或宋、五代词。

资料来源于 https://github.com/chinese-poetry/chinese-poetry

头像集字自王羲之（唐、诗、词）、董其昌（宋），“唐诗宋词”四字分别对应

https://shufa.supfree.net/x/59746.gif
https://shufa.supfree.net/x/22685.gif

content: 一富翁冬月暖阁重裘，围炉聚饮，酒半汗出，解衣去帽，大声曰：“今年冬月如此甚暖，乃四时之不正也。”门外仆人寒战，答曰：“主人在内说四时不正，我等门外衣单腹饿，寒风入骨，天时正得很呢!”【案此条又见《雪涛谐史》。】（《笑得好·四时不正》）
先将杏仁泡水，去皮尖，与上白米饭米对配，磨浆坠水，加糖炖熟，作茶吃之，甚为润肺。或单用杏仁磨浆加糖亦可。或用杏仁为君（为君：即为主），米用三分之一，无小磨，臼捣烂，布滤。（《醒园录·杏仁浆法作茶吃》）

由分院帽結果想到的一件小事：
有一次聽音樂會，給樹屋發消息一起買票但他在思考沒來得及回覆我，於是我單獨給自己買了票，沒有給樹屋買，我覺得他想聽的話可以自己買，我們沒有必要坐在一起。我的理由是：人把自己拋擲在和音樂的交流中，這是一個被音符充滿的世界，我們是否坐在一起沒有那麼重要，只要我們共享了一場聆聽就已經很幸福了，且和音樂的精神交流是專屬於每個人的私人體驗。樹屋非常委屈，也生氣了，他覺得坐在我旁邊聽是非常重要的，這讓他感覺自己被撇下了。我認真地給樹屋道歉（無條件寵著樹屋），很顯然我的自以為是給他造成了傷害，後來幸好買到了連坐的兩張票⋯（但我還是無法理解為什麼要坐在一起聽，望天.jpg

樹屋果然是毛茸茸的Hufflepuff，家庭（陪伴與愛）非常重要，是一種柔軟的小動物。

account.note:
記錄散步走神的日常與此刻的感知，在音樂、自然、詩歌里度過一無所有的生活

自我介紹好難，但可能是這樣的：
自我認同為非二元性向，為流動敏感的心顫動，與曖昧光影里搖曳的人情比鄰
常常半途而廢，也很膽小，喜歡漫遊、隨機聯結、輕輕觸碰等慢吞吞樹懶行為

warning：對陽剛之氣強烈過敏

content:
明天试试早餐依然麦当劳套餐🍔加茶叶蛋一个，午餐200克左右的米饭🍚……继续过午不食，看体重能不掉。
我真的真的实在是太爱吃大米饭了🍚，特别是电饭煲里刚蒸熟的米饭，真香！给盘肉都不换。
爱吃米饭🍚胜过肉食，爱吃肉食又胜过蔬菜🥬，暂时最不爱吃的就是蔬菜。
光吃米饭🍚我可以😌，反正我也不喜欢做菜，主要是做不好👎，我自己做的啥菜都不爱吃，不好吃👎，厨艺不行。

content:
Instinctive Sleeping and Resting Postures
----
- a day ago | 9 points | 0 comments
- URL: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1119282/
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39730748
- Summary: This article, "Instinctive sleeping and resting postures: an anthropological and zoological approach to treatment of low back and joint pain," by Michael Tetley, suggests that studying the sleeping and resting postures of primates in the wild can provide insights into reducing musculoskeletal problems, particularly low back pain, among civilized people. Tetley, a physiotherapist, shares his experiences observing various tribes and their similar postures, which included side-lying without a pillow, using arms as pillows to support damaged joints, and sleeping on shins to conserve heat. The author emphasizes that this is not a comparison of genes or races but of lifestyles. The study evokes the importance of adopting natural sleeping and resting postures as a preventative measure against musculoskeletal issues, while providing examples such as quadrupedal lying, sitting on the heels, and the full squat. The article humorously underlines the relevance of this knowledge to humans by questioning why anyone would sleep with a pillow like a gorilla or a dog.

card.title: Instinctive sleeping and resting postures: an anthropological and zoological approach to treatment of low back and joint pain

content:
AWS Makes Cloud Formation Stack Creation Up to 40% Faster
----
- 28 minutes ago | 5 points | 1 comments
- URL: https://www.infoq.com/news/2024/03/aws-cloud-formation-faster/
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39741179
- Summary: AWS optimized the Cloud Formation stack creation process to make it up to 40% faster by separating resource creation and stabilization into distinct phases. The new strategy optimistically starts creating further resources once the creation phase is complete, with a retry capability if creation fails. The change is available in all regions and introduced a new CONFIGURATION_COMPLETE event that can be used to speed up further resource or stack creation.

card.title: AWS Makes Cloud Formation Stack Creation up to 40% Faster
card.description: AWS optimized the stack creation process to make it faster and achieved significant improvements. The company split the resource creation process into two phases (creation and stabilization), which al

content:
macOS Sonoma 14.4 might break Java on your machine
----
- 32 minutes ago | 15 points | 8 comments
- URL: https://appleinsider.com/articles/24/03/16/oracle-advises-users-delay-sonoma-update-due-to-java-issue
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39741115
- Summary: Oracle has warned against updating to macOS Sonoma 14.4 for Mac users reliant on Java, as a bug in the release causes Java processes to terminate unexpectedly. Affected users include those with Java versions 8 and above, and a fix is not yet available. The issue was not present in beta versions, and Oracle has notified partners and Apple of the problem. Users with a cloned system configuration may be able to return to an older version to continue using Java. This issue does not affect typical Mac users, as Java was deprecated for the Mac in 2012. Additionally, the update has resulted in some fourth-party hubs and printer drivers not working properly.

card.title: macOS Sonoma 14.4 breaks Java on Apple Silicon, says Oracle
card.description: A bug in the release version of macOS Sonoma 14.4 causes Java processes to terminate unexpectedly, so Mac users who need to run Java should delay updating.
